name: heb-grocery-extension
description: Chrome extension to automate HEB grocery shopping

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:ts && npm run copy:assets
scripts.copy:assets: cp manifest.json dist/ && cp popup.html dist/ && cp popup.css dist/ && mkdir -p dist/icons && cp icons/*.png dist/icons/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp icons/*.svg dist/icons/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.watch: npm run clean && npm run copy:assets && esbuild src/content-script.ts src/background.ts src/popup.ts --bundle --outdir=dist --format=esm --platform=browser --target=chrome96 --watch
